text: Gennaro Olivieri (February 10, 1942 – January 27, 2020) was an Italian professional football player and coach. He played for 5 seasons (93 games, 1 goal) in the Serie A for SPAL 1907 and A.S. Roma. ==References== ==External links== * Career summary by playerhistory.com Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:S.S. title: Gennaro Olivieri
